name: Angel Cat Sugar
description:
Experience the new Japanese sensation that is taking Europe by Storm!

A new character from the original creator of Hello Kitty, Angel Cat Sugar is the story of Sugar, the princess of Angel Land, who has the power to heal hurt feelings. Help Sugar in her quest to save her friends Basil, Thyme and Parsley from the clutches of the Storm King, aiding the residents of Angel Land any way you can.

With an emphasis on fun and gentle learning, take a trip into Angel Land and find out how Angel Cat Sugar can be a new princess to rule your heart!
